text: Gilberto Agustoni (26 July 1922 - 13 January 2017) was a Swiss Roman Catholic prelate. He served as the Prefect of the Apostolic Signatura from 1994 to 1998. He was later a Cardinal-Priest of the Roman Catholic Church. He was born in Schaffhausen. Agustoni died on 13 January 2017 at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Swiss cardinals Category:People from Schaffhausen
title: Gilberto Agustoni
